pr_title: Seperate field errors into Warnings and errors

Feat field warnings field status refactor

timeline.bodyText: If this is commented out and not needed, it should just be deleted.
timeline.author: jamesrichard91

timeline.message: style: Removing comments

timeline.bodyText: I think it would be a good time to stop using a map here and start using an object that handles all this. It would clear up some code and make it easier to understand.
timeline.author: bamandel

replies.bodyText: Speaking with Paulo, we think this might be a good change to make as well. Since this is a feature branch we will make these changes in another branch and merge into this one rather than splitting it into two separate PRs.
replies.author: ChomickiM

replies.bodyText: Should AlertFieldStatus just have a field for fieldName? Then we deal with a list everywhere?
replies.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: You can abstract this further by creating a private method that is passed a function. The function will either do getErrors or getWarnings. You'd then call the method twice here with different functions passed.
timeline.author: bamandel

timeline.bodyText:
You can add a method to AlertFieldsStatus called getSeverityName that does this
alertFieldStatus.getSeverity().name()
timeline.author: bamandel

timeline.bodyText: These can be converted into const if you use a ternary operator like you did on line 30 and 31
timeline.author: bamandel
gkillough

replies.bodyText: That was the original code I had.  However errorValue can be null because there are no errors.  When errorValue is null object destructuring fails.  So that's why we have the code that is there.  If we change errorValue to {} then the check for errorValue will always be true.  We would have to test that
replies.author: psantos1113

timeline.message: refactor: Move AlertFieldStatus and FieldErrorsSeverity to a new package
refactor: Change AlertFieldStatus to store the the FieldName rather than use a map for AlertFieldException
refactor: Update classes to remove HashMaps and use new AlertFieldStatus object
test: Update tests to use Lists of AlertFieldStatus over HashMaps
refactor: Update ValidationResult by making duplicate streams into private method
refactor: Update LabelField to use ternary operator
style: Removing comments and renaming variables
refactor: Add new static method to DataStructureUtils
